mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PROD_MAIN.file (file_path, uuid, ori_name, ext, modify_date, file_size, create_user, `domain`, sub_domain, f_id, thumbnail_path) VALUES( #{filePath}, #{uuid}, #{oriName}, #{ext}, now(), #{fileSize}, #{createUser}, #{domain}, #{subDomain}, #{fId}, #{thumbnailPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_path filePath, uuid, ori_name oriName, ext, create_date createDate, modify_date modifyDate, file_size fileSize, create_user createUser, modify_user modifyUser, domain, sub_domain subDomain, f_id fId, thumbnail_path thumbnailPath FROM PROD_MAIN.file WHERE uuid = #{uuid}
